meanings.definition: The act of starting something again.
meanings.sent1: The recommencement of the race brought excitement to the spectators.
meanings.sent2: After the break, the recommencement of the movie was met with applause.
meanings.sent3: The recommencement of the game after the rain delay made everyone cheer.
meanings.sent4: The recommencement of the project felt like a fresh start for the team.
meanings.sent5: The recommencement of the music festival signaled a new beginning for the attendees.

meanings.definition: The beginning or resumption of an activity or process.
meanings.sent1: The recommencement of classes after summer break was eagerly awaited.
meanings.sent2: The recommencement of construction work signaled progress in the project.
meanings.sent3: The recommencement of baking cookies brought joy to the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The recommencement of the meeting led to productive discussions.
meanings.sent5: The recommencement of the train service improved commuters' daily routines.
